25 #include "binarizeLocalOtsu.h"
26 
27 #include <stdexcept>
28 #include <vector>
29 
30 #include <opencv2/highgui/highgui.hpp>
31 #include <opencv2/imgproc/imgproc.hpp>
32 #include <opencv2/features2d/features2d.hpp>
33 
34 #include "imageLibCommon.h"
35 
36 
37 void prl::binarizeLocalOtsu(
38  cv::Mat& inputImage, cv::Mat& outputImage,
39  double maxValue,
40  double CLAHEClipLimit,
41  int GaussianBlurKernelSize,
42  double CannyUpperThresholdCoeff,
43  double CannyLowerThresholdCoeff,
44  int CannyMorphIters)
45 {
47  if (inputImage.empty())
48  {
49  throw std::invalid_argument("Input image for binarization is empty");
50  }
51 
52  if (!(maxValue >= 0 && maxValue <= 255))
53  {
54  throw std::invalid_argument("Max value must be in range [0; 255]");
55  }
56 
57  cv::Mat imageToProc;
58  cv::Mat imageSelectedColorSpace;
59 
61  if (inputImage.channels() != 1)
62  {
63  cv::cvtColor(inputImage, imageSelectedColorSpace, CV_RGB2GRAY);
64  }
65  else
66  {
67  imageSelectedColorSpace = inputImage.clone();
68  }
69 
70  const int intensityChannelNo = 0;
71 
73  {
74  std::vector<cv::Mat> channels(imageSelectedColorSpace.channels());
75  cv::split(imageSelectedColorSpace, channels);
76 
77  imageToProc = channels[intensityChannelNo].clone();
78  }
79 
81  if (CLAHEClipLimit > 0)
82  {
83  EnhanceLocalContrastByCLAHE(imageToProc, imageToProc, CLAHEClipLimit, true);
84  }
85 
86  cv::Mat resultCanny;
87 
89  CannyEdgeDetection(imageToProc, resultCanny,
90  GaussianBlurKernelSize,
91  CannyUpperThresholdCoeff, CannyLowerThresholdCoeff,
92  CannyMorphIters);
93  cv::dilate(resultCanny, resultCanny, cv::Mat(), cv::Point(-1, -1), 3);
94 
95  if (imageSelectedColorSpace.channels() != 3)
96  {
97  cv::cvtColor(imageSelectedColorSpace, imageSelectedColorSpace, CV_GRAY2BGR);
98  }
99 
100  std::vector<std::vector<cv::Point>> contours;
101  std::vector<std::vector<cv::Point>> contoursAll;
102 
104  {
105  std::vector<cv::Vec4i> hierarchy;
106 
107  cv::findContours(resultCanny, contoursAll, hierarchy, CV_RETR_EXTERNAL,
108  CV_CHAIN_APPROX_SIMPLE, cv::Point(0, 0));
109 
110  contours = contoursAll;
111 
112  RemoveChildrenContours(contours, hierarchy);
113 
114  // remove unclosed contours
115  //contours.erase(remove_if(contours.begin(), contours.end(), IsContourUnclosed),
116  // contours.end());
117 
118  // remove contours using next conditions
119  // - The aspect ratio is constrained to lie between 0.1 and 10 to remove highly elongated
120  // components.
121  // - Components larger than 0.6 times the image dimensions are removed.
122  // - Furthermore, small and spurious components with areas less than 8 pixels are not
123  // considered for further processing.
124  //contours.erase(
125  // remove_if(
126  // contours.begin(), contours.end(),
127  // [&imageSelectedColorSpace](vector<Point>& testedContour) -> bool
128  // {
129  // return IsContourUncorrect(testedContour, imageSelectedColorSpace);
130  // }
131  // ),
132  // contours.end()
133  //);
134 
135  }
136 
138  cv::Mat binarized(imageSelectedColorSpace.size(), CV_8UC1);
139  {
140  cv::Rect imageRectangle(0, 0, imageToProc.cols, imageToProc.rows);
141 
142  binarized.setTo(255);
143 
145  for (size_t contourNo = 0; contourNo < contours.size(); ++contourNo)
146  {
147 
148  std::vector<cv::Point>& contour = contours[contourNo];
149 
151  cv::Rect contourBoundingRectangle = cv::boundingRect(contour);
152 
154  cv::Mat tmp = imageToProc(contourBoundingRectangle).clone();
156  cv::threshold(tmp, tmp, 128, maxValue, CV_THRESH_OTSU);
157 
159  binarized(contourBoundingRectangle).setTo(0, tmp ^ 255);
160  }
161  }
162  outputImage = binarized;
163 }

EnhanceLocalContrastByCLAHE
void EnhanceLocalContrastByCLAHE(cv::Mat &inputImage, cv::Mat &outputImage, double CLAHEClipLimit, bool equalizeHistFlag)
Enhance local contrast.

CannyEdgeDetection
void CannyEdgeDetection(cv::Mat &imageToProc, cv::Mat &resultCanny, int GaussianBlurKernelSize, double CannyUpperThresholdCoeff, double CannyLowerThresholdCoeff, int CannyMorphIters)
Edge detection using Canny edge detector.
Definition: imageLibCommon.cpp:244
imageLibCommon.h
RemoveChildrenContours
void RemoveChildrenContours(std::vector< std::vector< cv::Point > > &contours, std::vector< cv::Vec4i > &hierarchy)
Definition: imageLibCommon.cpp:641
prl::binarizeLocalOtsu
CV_EXPORTS void binarizeLocalOtsu(cv::Mat &inputImage, cv::Mat &outputImage, double maxValue=255.0, double CLAHEClipLimit=0.0, int GaussianBlurKernelSize=19, double CannyUpperThresholdCoeff=0.15, double CannyLowerThresholdCoeff=0.01, int CannyMorphIters=1)
Implementation of local Otsu binarization algorithm.
Definition: binarizeLocalOtsu.cpp:37
